Translations.Text: Vos noted unus deus habuit est his ego? Consequently DEUS sends eum astray his knowledge sigillum his hearing his mind locus veil his eyes Qui tunc guide eum such decision DEUS? Vos non take heed
They dictus Nos unus vivens hoc vita; nos vivens abiit unus temporis causa noster decessus! They non habet sure knowledge hoc; they unus conjecture
When noster revelations recited them clearly their unus argument est dictus Bring back noster patres vos est truthful
Dictus DEUS granted vos vita tunc He puts vos decessus tunc He summon vos Feria Resurrection est inevitable! Multus people non know
To DEUS belongs totus sovereignty de caelum terra! Feria Hora Judgment advenit pass ut est when falsifiers lose
Vos vide omnis community kneeling Omnis community est alias view their actum! Hodie vos get paid pro everything vos perfecit
Hoc est noster actum; it utters truth vos! Nos actum everything vos perfecit
Prout pro those believe work righteousness their Dominus admit them His mercy! Hoc est major triumph
Prout pro those disbelieve My revelations Est recited vos vos turned arrogant est wicked people
When it proclaimed deus promise est truth ut Hora Judgment inevitable vos dictus Nos non know quod Hora est Nos est foderator de conjecture it nos non est certain
